text: ‘‘Nivu nanage ukkina halegalannu tandu kodiri.’’ Hige, avaru eradu parvatagala naduvana antaravannu muccida balika, ‘‘idannu cennagi urisiri’’ endu adesisidaru. Konege avaru adannu benkiyagisidaru. Aga avaru, ‘‘iga nanna balige karagida tamravannu tanniri, nanu adannu idara mele suriyuttene’’ endaru
